title: Exploring a Gradient-based Explainable AI Technique for Time-Series Data: A Case Study of Assessing Stroke Rehabilitation Exercises. (arXiv:2305.05525v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: Explainable artificial intelligence (AI) techniques are increasingly being explored to provide insights into why AI and machine learning (ML) models provide a certain outcome in various applications. translated_title: 基于梯度的可解释AI技术在时间序列数据中的探索：以评估中风康复锻炼为例
translated_abstract: 可解释AI技术被广泛应用于各种应用中，然而在医疗保健领域尤其是时间序列数据上的探索却有限。本文提出了一种基于弱监督模型和基于梯度的可解释AI技术的方法，用于识别在中风康复锻炼中涉及补偿动作的时间序列数据中的显著帧，并取得了不错的评估结果。
tldr: 本文提出了一种基于梯度的可解释AI技术的方法，用于识别时间序列数据中的显著帧，在中风康复锻炼领域具有应用潜力。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a threshold-based method that utilizes a weakly supervised model and a gradient-based explainable AI technique to identify salient frames of time-series data, and applies it to stroke rehabilitation exercises, with good evaluation results and potential applications in the field.
